channel.title: Ok compiler help please
channel.description:
ok i have been trying for weeks to make my server and i have done everything cept the compile.bat and run.bat my code for compile.bat is
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compiler. echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
and the run.bat code i am using is
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title Devolutionv7 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
someone give me a link to download JDK and tell me which one to download because i am unsure and if it matter im using windows vista help please :confused:

item.title: Ok compiler help please
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Ohhh. Vista is what you are using. Sorry, I remain ignorant about Vista. I have been hearing that Vista is not very good.

I’m not sure if it still works the same with Vista. Someone with Vista or knows, will have to help you. If you would have told me you used Vista, I would have knew I wouldn’t be able to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok compiler help please
item.dc:creator: @pownage pownage
item.description:
@pownage wrote:

ok i have been trying for weeks to make my server and i have done everything cept the compile.bat and run.bat my code for compile.bat is

@echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compiler. echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

and the run.bat code i am using is

@echo off COLOR 09 title Devolutionv7 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

someone give me a link to download JDK and tell me which one to download because i am unsure and if it matter im using windows vista help please
